entry.title: BIP0032
entry.summary: Tamas Blummer has shared a JSON-ed version of test vectors on GitHub along with Bits of Proof code matching with them. The JSON file can be accessed at https://github.com/bitsofproof/supernode/blob/master/api/src/test/resources/BIP32.json and the code can be found at https://github.com/bitsofproof/supernode/blob/master/api/src/main/java/com/bitsofproof/supernode/api/ExtendedKey.java. Blummer has also attached a signature.asc file to the message.
